Nice to meet you

I am{" "} Nitish Mehta , a Web Developer and creative designer with 2+ years of{" "} experience . For over a decade, I worked with Internship Projects.

Front End Developer and Web Designer with proven experience at{" "} Oasis Infobyte {" "} , OctaNet Services Pvt Ltd.{" "} {" "} Bharat Intern.{" "} {" "} where I had the opportunity to work on various projects for in helping companies create and maintain a better code base for reusability.

In 2019 I started my independent design practice using my experience to help early-stage startups and businesses to create high-quality websites and online presence that customers love and let businesses thrive.

I'm based in Kalyan, Maharashtra, India, and collaborate with clients across the world.
